Title: Persian Scheduler and Calendar Control
Description:
This is a Jalali (Persian or shamsi) calendar and scheduler control in silverlight.
Choosing the name 'Jalali' is in honor of 'Hakim omar khayyam' the founder of Jalali calendar.
This is under the lisence of 'Barid New Systems' company.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This is a collection of two controls (Persian Scheduler Control) and (Persian Date Picker Control) based on silverlight technology.

﻿

 

 

These are just the first steps. I will improve this in the future.
